description: Gets a segment definition from the domain.

parameters.name: DomainName
parameters.description: The unique name of the domain.

parameters.name: SegmentDefinitionName
parameters.description: The unique name of the segment definition.

nested_items.name: SegmentDefinitionName
nested_items.description: The name of the segment definition.

nested_items.name: DisplayName
nested_items.description: The display name of the segment definition.

nested_items.name: Description
nested_items.description: The description of the segment definition.

nested_items.name: SegmentGroups
nested_items.description: The segment criteria associated with this definition.

nested_items.name: Groups
nested_items.description: Holds the list of groups within the segment definition.

nested_items.name: Dimensions
nested_items.description: Defines the attributes to segment on.

nested_items.name: ProfileAttributes
nested_items.description: Object that holds the profile attributes to segment on.

nested_items.description: A field to describe values to segment on within account number.

nested_items.name: CalculatedAttributes
nested_items.description: Object that holds the calculated attributes to segment on.

nested_items.name: Values
nested_items.description: The values to apply the DimensionType with.

nested_items.name: ConditionOverrides
nested_items.description: Applies the given condition over the initial Calculated Attribute's definition.

nested_items.name: Start
nested_items.description: The start time of when to include objects.

nested_items.name: End
nested_items.description: The end time of when to include objects.

nested_items.name: Unit
nested_items.description: The unit for start and end.

nested_items.name: SourceSegments
nested_items.description: Defines the starting source of data.

nested_items.name: SegmentDefinitionName
nested_items.description: The unique name of the segment definition.

nested_items.name: SourceType
nested_items.description: Defines how to interact with the source data.

nested_items.name: Type
nested_items.description: Defines how to interact with the profiles found in the current filtering.

nested_items.name: Include
nested_items.description: Defines whether to include or exclude the profiles that fit the segment criteria.

nested_items.name: SegmentDefinitionArn
nested_items.description: The arn of the segment definition.

nested_items.name: CreatedAt
nested_items.description: The timestamp of when the segment definition was created.
